AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised as a Klingon Warrior . Being a child, [PAWN_pronoun] followed the traditions of the Klingon race and was a powerful warrior.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Coward
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised as a Klingon Warrior , however battle scared him. Luckily, [PAWN_pronoun] found work training Targs and other vicious beasts for battle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Politician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the firstborn to a great house and as such had a seat on the High Council.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Schemer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] preferred to disregard the traditions of their people and used subtlety. Poison and murder were chief among their list of accomplishments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Colony Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a remote world within the Klingon Empire.[PAWN_nameDef] was put to work as a farmer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Warrior-in-training
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the homeworld of the Klingon Empire, Qo'NoS. [PAWN_nameDef] trained to be a true Klingon warrior.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Bastard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Qo'NoS to an unknown father and his commoner mistress.[PAWN_nameDef] was shamed for being born out of wedlock.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Klingon Noble Born
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the firstborn to a Klingon Great House on the Klingon homeworl, Qo'NoS. [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed for leadership and combat since birth
